t: Amazon’s electric delivery vehicles from Rivian roll out across the U.S.

t: You can now shop for electric cars at Amazon after Skoda partnership announced | The Independent
s: April 30, 2025 - Skoda and Amazon have teamed up with a new online showroom displaying stock cars in real time. The Czech brand – part of the Volkswagen empire – will let you browse its entire model range on the retail platform, including electric models the Skoda Elroq and Skoda Enyaq.

t: Amazon is testing Rivian electric delivery vans in Los Angeles

t: Is it a Bad Idea to Buy Electric Bikes on Amazon? – Tesway US
s: September 14, 2024 - Well-established e-bike brands typically offer the same warranties for their products sold on Amazon as they do through other channels. These warranties usually cover the motor, battery, and electrical components for a specified period, such as one or two years.

t: Go behind the scenes as Amazon develops a new electric vehicle
